title: Fifty Shades of Grey : U.S. sales figures in 2012 , by platform
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of copies in millions for 2 number of Copy Types.
The maximum Number of copies in millions 29.0 is found at Copy Type Print and the minimum is found at Digital where Copy Type is 15.0.
The highest Copy Type Print has 14.0 more Number of copies in millions than the lowest Copy Type Digital.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of copies in millions for 2 number of Copy Types.
Copy Type Print has the highest Number of copies in millions and Digital has the lowest Number of copies in millions.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of copies in millions for 2 number of Copy Types.
The maximum Number of copies in millions 29.0 is found at Copy Type Print and the minimum is found at Digital where Copy Type is 15.0.
The highest Copy Type Print has 14.0 more Number of copies in millions than the lowest Copy Type Digital.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Copy Type in the x axis and Number of copies in millions in the y axis.
The Number of copies in millions is appeared to be the highest at Copy Type Print and lowest at Copy Type Digital.
The highest Copy Type Print has 14.0 more Number of copies in millions than the lowest Copy Type Digital.
The Copy Type Print has 1.32 times more Number of copies in millions than average.
